alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Greeley; Hall; Howard; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 3:33PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected at times. For the Winter Storm Warning, pockets of lingering heavy snow expected, along with possible light icing from freezing drizzle especially late tonight into Tuesday morning within counties north and west of the Tri Cities. Additional snow accumulations mainly between 3 and 6 inches, most of which will fall through tonight. Northwest winds gusting 30 to 40 MPH into this evening, but decreasing to no more than 20 to 30 MPH most areas late tonight through Wednesday. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Nebraska, including the Tri Cities. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until midnight CST tonight. For the Winter Storm Warning, from midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely dangerous. Do not travel. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay in your vehicle. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
